info.name: William Travel API
info.description: A comprehensive collection of API endpoints for William Travel application

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for user registration, login and password management

request.description: Create a new user account and return access token
OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests
Get user by ID (own user or superuser only)
Retrieve roles with their permissions (superuser only)
Create new role with permissions (superuser only)
Get role by ID, including its permissions (superuser only)
Update a role and its permissions (superuser only)
Create new article category (admins and content managers only)
Retrieve organizers created by the current user

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Hanoi Food Festival",
    "description": "Annual food festival featuring Vietnamese cuisine",
    "start_date": "2025-06-15T10:00:00",
    "end_date": "2025-06-20T18:00:00",
    "city_id": 1,
    "organizer_id": 1,
    "venue": "Hanoi Old Quarter",
    "address": "Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi"
}

request.description: Get specific community post by ID
Delete a community post (owner or admin only)
Get media files for a specific reference
Create a new rating or update existing
Get ratings for a specific item
Get average rating for a specific item
Delete a rating (owner or admin only)

item.name: Variables
item.description:
The following variables should be set in your environment:

- base_url: Your API base URL (e.g., http://localhost:8000)
- access_token: The JWT token received after login
